{include "affiliate_loader"} The real test of our progress is what comes next. Support the ACLU today so we can keep our momentum in 2021. {include "pre-header-spacing"}{beacon}

{include "default_salutation"} –

After a historic year of reckoning for our country and state over racial injustice, the real test of our progress is what comes next.

In 2020, ACLU of Louisiana and supporters like you voted like our rights depended on it, fought to protect incarcerated people and detained immigrants from a deadly pandemic, and launched an initiative called Justice Lab to challenge racist policing across the state. We were able to do all of this and more because of dedicated supporters like you.

The work isn't finished. In fact, it's only just begun. Your gift this December will empower our Black-led organization to keep our momentum in 2021. And if you support the ACLU of Louisiana today, your gift will go twice as far. From now through December 31, a generous donor is matching all gifts up to $25,000.

Visit our website to give now and double your impact on civil rights and liberties in Louisiana.

Donate Today

Every gift counts, no matter the size. If you are able to make a gift this year, please don't wait. Support the ACLU of Louisiana today.

Thank you and have a happy and safe holiday season,

ACLU of {affiliate_name}
